parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "title": {{ JSON.stringify($json.title) }},
  "summary": {{ JSON.stringify($json.summary) }},
  "content": {{ JSON.stringify($json.content.substring(0, 10000)) }},
  "ai_summary": {{ JSON.stringify($json.summary.substring(0, 200)) }},
  "source": {{ JSON.stringify($json.source) }},
  "source_type": "rss",
  "url": {{ JSON.stringify($json.url) }},
  "slug": {{ JSON.stringify($json.slug) }},
  "news_type": "gossip",
  "credibility_score": {{ $json.credibilityScore }},
  "verification_status": "unverified",
  "gossip_tags": {{ JSON.stringify($json.tags) }},
  "likes_count": 0,
  "comments_count": 0,
  "status": {{ $json.credibilityScore >= 65 ? '"published"' : '"draft"' }},
  "category": "crypto-general",
  "content_published_at": {{ JSON.stringify($json.publishedAt) }},
  "published_at": {{ JSON.stringify(new Date().toISOString()) }}
}
